Test Name: Ureaplasma Species Molecular Detection by PCR
Specimen Type: Endocervical swabs, urine, urethral swabs, amniotic fluid, placenta, other tissues
Purpose: To detect and identify Ureaplasma species DNA in clinical specimens using PCR for diagnostic purposes.
Container: Swabs in transport medium for nucleic acid preservation or urine in a sterile container
Equipment: Class II biosafety cabinet, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, real-time PCR thermal cycler, UV spectrophotometer/fluorometer, refrigerators and freezers
